name: Cornmeal 'dropped' Scones
keywords: all-purpose flour, buttermilk, cornmeal, nut-free, vegetarian, side dish
recipeIngredient: Oil or drippings for the pan

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium bowl, combine dry ingredients. In a separate bowl, beat egg and buttermilk. Add liquid ingredients to dry ingredients and blend until just combined. Do not overmix. May be prepared up to 1 hour in advance to this point.

Grease a skillet or griddle as you would for pancakes. Heat over medium-high heat. Drop in batter by scant tablespoons and cook about 1 minute each side, or until puffy and golden brown. Drain briefly on paper towels and serve hot.
